name: Block Bottom
description:
Block Bottom is a prototype game that was designed for the Android platform during the Krass-N.G. 4 Jam. The theme was "A game where you mine ore from cloud cities in the name of love." The concept of mining was implemented, lacking a proper storyline, yet one could easily see that the topic is fitting.

The gameplay is straightforward : Use the arrow keys to dig down within two minutes, destroying as many blocks as possible and avoid getting crushed along the way !

More content is scheduled already, but due to the Jam scope and timeline has been excluded from this prototype version. For your entertainment... I present you with Block Bottom !
